General.Name: Blueharbor Bank
General.Description: blueharbor bank engages in the provision of various banking products and services in North Carolina. It accepts personal and business checking, savings, time deposits, and investment accounts; and offers personal loans, such as financing for residential lots and automobiles, and residential construction loans, as well as business loans comprising small business and commercial construction loans, and lines of credit. The company also provides overdrafts, financial planning, wealth management, trade execution, remote deposit capture, and online banking services, as well as offers debit and credit cards. It serves Iredell County, northern Mecklenburg County, and surrounding areas through its banking offices in Mooresville, Statesville, and Huntersville, North Carolina, as well as loan production offices in Belmont and Morehead City, North Carolina. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Mooresville, North Carolina.
General.Address: 106 Corporate Park Drive, Mooresville, NC, United States, 28117
